transcript:

Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: So this is our

Executive: One thing you do, sir, go to settings.

Customer: Okay.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: One second, network.
Executive: Buylead preferences, it came. Come down to category preferences.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Hmm. In this, the bottom most, on the right side, there is an option, non-preferred category.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Put this in it, add this category, match it, sir.
Customer: Means?
Executive: Add it, this lead, bar cutting machine, write it.
Customer: This here, in the middle, it is showing, bar cutting machine, cross it.
Executive: Ha, cross it from there, mark it as non-preferred on the right side, sir, you.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: So it's done.
Customer: It's done?
Executive: Yes. Any inquiry or call came, sir, since it went live, in four-five days?
Customer: No, no, no.
Executive: Call are coming but the problem is that they don't need plant.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: They need material.
Executive: Okay. Material means that which is our, which is our product, from that below, from our product, the product that will be made.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: They demand that product. And that too, not like too much, someone needs one bag, someone needs two bags, that's it.
Executive: Of material, one second, hold on.
Customer: Mobile.
Executive: I have activated all the products that were in deactivation.
Executive: So that the mapping is correct and its, uh, it can increase. Mobile concrete mixture. Take this, I am sending a lead, consume it now. It will come now.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Uh, sir, I was not busy, sir, because of network issue, the call was not connecting, I was calling you only. Pick this lead, I have sent it to you now.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Consume this, sir, you.
Executive: Morena, Madhya Pradesh.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: No problem, you consume it. Mobile concrete mixture first. In that, consume, you have successfully purchased this lead is written, sir.
Customer: It's coming?
Executive: You have successfully purchased. Purchased, you have done it. Okay, I am sending another one, do this, self-loading concrete mixture, it came one minute ago. Contact buyer, sir.
Executive: Your mapping, after correcting it first, I will increase the lead flow rate.
Customer: Yeah, processing.

Customer: Okay.
Executive: Now we, now buylead. In this quotation, send quotation.
Customer: No, no, no. Ha, you, did you contact buyer?
Customer: Ha, ha.
Executive: Okay, send reply and cross it.
Customer: Okay. Uh, now send reply option is coming, in this send quotation now option is coming.
Executive: Now leave it, just contact buyer.
Customer: Okay. I have clicked, after clicking this page has opened for me.
Executive: Contact buyer option will be coming, sir. Quotation send, send text, some reply do, sir, so that it will be done.
Executive: Consume all these leads.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Okay, now tell me what to do?
Executive: It's done, sir, contact.
Customer: Uh, second, in this, the page has just, okay, okay, okay.
Executive: Hmm, hmm, ji.
Customer: Even our products are not coming, in this concrete mixture, the leads are coming.
Executive: That's why it is doing, because concrete mixture plant, now these are increasing, like the unnecessary leads that are coming, these all can be removed first.
Executive: What happened was, sir, it was completely unused for one month, right? Now we have started using it, so then it starts again, everything, that's why this thing has happened.
Customer: Sure.
Executive: Ha. One second, wait, I will send you more leads, checking that.
Executive: Take this, ready mix concrete plant is there, Faridabad, plant has come, this do it quickly, sir, consume.
Customer: Okay, I will do it. This also do it.
Executive: This is of our use.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Five minutes ago it has come.
Customer: These are showing in your, why are they not showing in ours?
Executive: No, you, these, now we have product, sir, those were removed earlier, sir, the old ones were, live it, then I searched, now you also search from above, then you will see it in your portal. You directly search it from above. One more lead I am sending, do this. Now your mapping will be correct, now leads will come. Like this, you search product or search buylead option comes on your top. You write the name and search directly, then it will be visible. Now in starting we have to do a little bit like this. Then automatically, sir, it will start showing in your portal, this, this.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay, sir?
Executive: Rest, if any other issue comes, then please tell me, I will help you, sir.
Customer: Yes, absolutely, absolutely, I will message you.
Executive: Okay, sir, absolutely, sir. Okay, sir.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Bar cutting machine lead in wrong category.

- Calls for material, not plant.

- Products not showing on portal.



Resolution:

- Guided to mark bar cutting machine as non-preferred.

- Reactivated products in deactivation.

- Sent multiple leads for mobile concrete mixture.

- Instructed to contact buyer and send reply.

- Advised to search product/buylead directly on portal.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, category, product, portal, mapping
